mapper.select: SELECT t1.puk,t1.p01_gysid,t1.p02_zjbs,t1.k01_zczid,t1.k02_zj68bh,t1.k03_zj123lb,t1.k04_scqyid,t1.f01_zczzwmc,t1.f02_zczywmc,t1.f03_cpzwmc,t1.f04_cpywmc,t1.f05_fzgjmc, t1.f06_fzdwmc,t1.f07_fzrq,t1.f08_yxnx,t1.f09_yxksrq,t1.f10_yxzzrq,t1.f11_shzt,t1.f12_yqbz,t1.f13_yqzh,t1.f14_yqsj,t1.f15_sfty,t1.f16_jkbz,t1.f17_cpzxbzbh, t1.f18_cpxnjgjzc,t1.f19_cpsyfw,t1.f20_cpjjz,t1.f21_zcdzszgj,t1.f22_zcdljgid,t1.f23_zcdljgmc,t1.f24_shfwjgid,t1.f25_shfwjgmc,t1.f26_shfwrx,t1.f27_shfwdz, t1.f28_wlwjbcwz,t1.f29_zysx,t1.f30_bz,t1.f31_scqyzzjgdm,t1.f32_scqyzwmc,t1.f33_scqydz,t1.f34_scqyyb,t1.f35_scqydhhm,t1.f36_scqyywmc,t1.f37_scqypym, t1.f38_scqylxrxm,t1.f39_scqylxraqyx,t1.f40_scqylxrdh,t1.f41_sfgq,t1.f42_fzdwid,t1.f43,t1.f44,t1.f45,t1.bbb,t1.fb1,t1.fb2,t1.fb3,t1.fb4,t1.fb5,t1.eb2, t1.ggg,t1.ppp,t1.ddd,t1.cc1,t1.cc2,t1.uu1,datediff(t1.f10_yxzzrq, #{eb1}) > 0 AS eb1 FROM mgaac_ylqxzcz t1 WHERE t1.p01_gysid = #{p01_gysid} AND t1.ddd != '1' AND t1.puk NOT IN ( SELECT t2.puk FROM mgta_cjylqxzcz t2 WHERE t2.p01_gysid = #{p01_gysid} AND t2.p03_yyid = #{p03_yyid} AND t2.ddd != '1' )

SELECT t1.puk, t1.f01_yhxm, ISNULL(t2.puk) AS eb5 FROM mssuu t1 LEFT JOIN mgt5_xsrywts t2 ON (t1.puk = t2.f09 AND t2.p01_yyid = #{p01_yyid} AND t2.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} AND t2.ddd != '1') WHERE t1.k01_ssqyid = #{k01_gysid} AND t1.ddd != '1'

SELECT yyzz.puk, 1 AS eb1 FROM mga1_yyzz yyzz WHERE yyzz.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} AND yyzz.ddd != '1' UNION SELECT jyxkz.puk, 2 AS eb1 FROM mga2_jyxkz jyxkz WHERE jyxkz.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} AND jyxkz.ddd != '1' UNION SELECT swdjz.puk, 3 AS eb1 FROM mga3_gsswdjz swdjz WHERE swdjz.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} AND swdjz.ddd != '1' UNION SELECT jxsqs.puk, 4 AS eb1 FROM mga4_jxsqs jxsqs WHERE jxsqs.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} AND jxsqs.puk IN ( SELECT sqszcz.puk FROM mgad_sqsglzczxx sqszcz WHERE sqszcz.k02_zczid IN (#{eb1}) AND sqszcz.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} ) UNION SELECT wts.puk, 5 AS eb1 FROM mga5_xsrywts wts WHERE wts.f11 = #{eb2} AND wts.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} UNION SELECT cns.puk, 6 AS eb1 FROM mga6_shfwcns cns WHERE cns.f10 = #{eb2} AND cns.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} UNION SELECT cjyyzz.puk, 7 AS eb1 FROM mga8c_yyzz cjyyzz WHERE cjyyzz.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} AND cjyyzz.k02_sccj_qyid IN ( SELECT zcz.k04_scqyid FROM mgaac_ylqxzcz zcz WHERE zcz.puk IN (#{eb1}) AND zcz.p01_gysid = #{k01_gysid}) UNION SELECT cjscxkz.puk, 8 AS eb8 FROM mga9c_scxkz cjscxkz WHERE cjscxkz.k01_gysid = #{k01_gysid} AND cjscxkz.k02_sccj_qyid IN ( SELECT zcz.k04_scqyid FROM mgaac_ylqxzcz zcz WHERE zcz.puk IN (#{eb1}) AND zcz.p01_gysid = #{k01_gysid})
